extendedInfo.description: Securely Access all your corporate resources from your device through a Virtual Private Network (VPN) tunnel. As you launch business applications such as RDP, VoIP or any other app on your mobile device, all transmitted data to corporate is encrypted, without any additional actions required by you. This application connects to a Check Point Security Gateway. Please contact your security Administrator for first-time setup. For an SSL VPN Portal application please download the âCheck Point Mobileâ application.Administrators: Deployment details are available on the support site: http://supportcontent.checkpoint.com/solutions?id=sk84141Application Featuresâ¢ Securely connect to corporate resources from your Android device with a full layer-3 VPN tunnelâ¢ Supports SSL and IPSec (including visitor mode) â¢ Authentication methods: user/password, user certificate, challenge/response, one time password tokensâ¢ VPN Connection persistency upon device roaming â¢ Always attempt to connect after session expires or device rebootâ¢ Scan a QR code or click a URL for a 1-step first-time-configuration â¢ API for external applications About Check Point Software Technologies Check Point Software Technologies, Ltd. is a world-wide leader in Network and Endpoint Security. Visit www.checkpoint.com

reviews.title: Now finally works
reviews.comment: Cannot understand how could checkpoint release a version for a week, which was simple crashing after successful login? The current version works fine, and does its job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: After logging in , can\'t check the box for trusting this application.  Nothing happens when touching the check box on Nexus 7 running Android 4.3.  Removed Lux brightness app and it works.

reviews.title: kindle fire hd 8,9
reviews.comment: Unfortunely app not work on KFHD because problem in com.android.vpndialogs: after user name and pass was entered an exception appear \"process com.androidvpn stopped\". On ZTE Libra the same version of app are working fine. Both devices tried to connect to the same network. Developers please help, this app very important for me. Thanks in advance!
reviews.author: Taras Krushinskiy

reviews.title: Last update does not work
reviews.comment: Tested on Huawei U9200 and Prestigio PAP4300 duo - both \"Unfotunately Mobile VPN stop working\". Very sad for corporate VPN users. Full device reset does not help.

reviews.title: Not working htc sensation ics
reviews.comment: ! Update I am the firewall admin and on one phone it is working on other like mine don\'t. Whith the newest update I can\'t even connect, only force close. I also have checkpoint support I wrote to them about this problem but I did not get any answer that\'s why I am writing this rewiev. I can connect but nothing more, I dont have access to corporate resources or internet on the phone. On htc one v ics it is woking with same config on checkpoint.
reviews.author: A Google User
